contents:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree vacated and case remanded for an adjudication in conformity with Pennsylvania Rules of Civil Procedure 1516-1519. See Thompson v. Thompson, 451 Pa. 546, 301 A. 2d 644 (1973), Stryjewski v. Local No. 830, 451 Pa. 550, 304 A. 2d 463 (1973), and Community Sports, Inc. v. Oakland Oaks, 429 Pa. 412, 240 A. 2d 491 (1968). Each party to bear own costs.
